name: Edamame Moringa Dip Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: shelled edamame, paprika, cumin, garlic, tahini, lemon juice, water, moringa powder, salt, olive oil
recipeInstructionSteps: In a food processor, combine the edamame, paprika, cumin, garlic, tahini, lemon juice, water, moringa powder, and salt and puree until smooth.
Drizzle the olive oil over the hummus. Serve with raw vegetables and crackers.
But before you do, take a photo and post it on your ‘gram!
